subject: Question
description_text:
Hello there, so i order pedals with vam
Order number:
#SSN4612
But is there any possibility to cancel the order because i wanna add also
that new shifter what you get in offer... i was been so excited to buy and
i buy without seeing new shifter..
So if there is any chance i will just like to add shifter in same order
because if i'm buying it separately it cost me much more and also shipping
is not free.. but if i buy all together shipping is free and i can us my
discount. Thanks anyway!

conversations.body_text:
I will buy shifter anyway so just ignore my previous message! Have good day
guys!

Sorry again me but i went to check if i wanna buy solo that new upcoming
shifter and it will cost me much more if i'm buying solo shifter because
i'm from Croatia, so i will really be greatfull if you guys can give me
money back for that order what i make and then i will make a new order with
pedals, vam and shifter together and in that way shipping will be free for
me and i will been able to use discount for all if it's possible. If it's
not possible just let me know!
